channel.title: New wallpaper time
channel.description:
I was experimenting a little and decided i needed a new wallpaper. I've posted my other wallpapers here and ive gotten good replies so i guess ill post this one:
Original render: [img]http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs50/f/2009/329/5/7/Ball_wallpaper_by_Frell262.jpg[/img]
Post effects in GIMP: [img]http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs51/f/2009/329/c/6/Ball_Wallpaper_Post_Effects_by_Frell262.jpg[/img]
I personally like the second one better but some may think otherwise. Although it is a little too sharp.

item.title: New wallpaper time
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“fezz, post:20, topic:316375”]your 2nd LP shows something i dont get about c4d, why is the lighting on the balloons cut in 3 pieces, or is that something else.

i need to update my c4d I’m still using r10 O_o is 11.5 worth the hassle?[/quote]
I didnt buy it

And its an HDRI map.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“sanga282, post:18, topic:316375”]i tried that and it didnt go that well, at all so this time ive just placed a lot of balls in a cuboid shape and allowed them to fall, i’ll post results
ps i tried to emulate your first texture[/quote]
Gradient thats striped, reflection is Fresnel and mixture strength is 50%

item.title: New wallpaper time
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:316375”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=412935.msg3043161#msg3043161 date=1259270952]

how did you do that? an emitter with gravity pulling the balls down? or just placed tonnes of balls

Dynamics. The dynamics system in r11 sucks so my r11.5 crack download is almost done <3. In r11 one click turns an object into a rigid body.

Ive been using the rigid body tag in r11 but like even with collisions on the Full setting they still go through each other
[/quote]
Solver (in attributes change Collision EPS to 1)
-Gravity
-Plane (editable) (rigid body tag, full collision, mass 0)
-Sphere (editable) (rigid body tag, full collision, mass 1, elasticity 20%)[/quote]
i have that and it works for one sphere but if i have an emitter it doesnt

Read full topic

item.title: New wallpaper time
item.dc:creator: @933pm 933pm
item.description:
@933pm wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:316375”][quote author=933pm link=topic=412935.msg3042579#msg3042579 date=1259231084]
Do you think you could make me a wallpaper in 1280x800? Anything dark and abstract-ish would be great. Here’s what I have currently: http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/434/46510192.png
Also, my taskbar covers up roughly 140 pixels of the right side of the wallpaper.
Please and thank you
[/quote]
=\ I don’t really do 2d gfx if that what you were asking.[/quote]

No I was just trying to show the like color scheme and such that appeals to me

Read full topic

item.title: New wallpaper time
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:10, topic:316375”][quote author=Frell link=topic=412935.msg3042938#msg3042938 date=1259259562]

how did you do that? an emitter with gravity pulling the balls down? or just placed tonnes of balls

Dynamics. The dynamics system in r11 sucks so my r11.5 crack download is almost done <3. In r11 one click turns an object into a rigid body.
[/quote]
Ive been using the rigid body tag in r11 but like even with collisions on the Full setting they still go through each other[/quote]
Solver (in attributes change Collision EPS to 1)
-Gravity
-Plane (editable) (rigid body tag, full collision, mass 0)
-Sphere (editable) (rigid body tag, full collision, mass 1, elasticity 20%)

Read full topic

item.title: New wallpaper time
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

sanga282:

how did you do that? an emitter with gravity pulling the balls down? or just placed tonnes of balls

Dynamics. The dynamics system in r11 sucks so my r11.5 crack download is almost done <3. In r11 one click turns an object into a rigid body.

[quote=“933pm, post:6, topic:316375”]Do you think you could make me a wallpaper in 1280x800? Anything dark and abstract-ish would be great. Here’s what I have currently: http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/434/46510192.png
Also, my taskbar covers up roughly 140 pixels of the right side of the wallpaper.
Please and thank you :D[/quote]
=\ I don’t really do 2d gfx if that what you were asking.

Read full topic

item.title: New wallpaper time
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Well im usually messing around with something new i learned, so maybe 20 minutes for the concept and getting a natural scene, 2-5 minutes setting up the camera, and 10-15 minutes for the render. This time i spent about 10 minutes working in GIMP.

Read full topic
